imdb.title: Last Hope
imdb.plot: After causing the near extinction of mankind seven years ago, genius scientist Leon Lau must now fight the ecological disaster he unwittingly created.

episodes.title: The Evolving Destroyer
episodes.plot: The last remnants of mankind fight for survival against the B.R.A.I., and ever-evolving entity blurring the boundaries between lifeforms and A.I.

episodes.title: The Opener of the Box
episodes.plot: Leon's research proves effective as his newfound powers overwhelm a monstrous B.R.A.I., leading Cain to propose an alliance to protect the city.

episodes.title: Neo Xianglong 2038
episodes.plot: Jay reluctantly orders Leon to continue his research on the unstable hyperdrive system in hopes of gaining a tactical advantage against the B.R.A.I.

episodes.title: Operation Howl Breakthrough
episodes.plot: Feeling responsible for the reactor accident, Leon offers to go to the frontline when a new type of B.R.A.I threatens to destroy the city.

episodes.title: The Enemy Above
episodes.plot: When a cargo plane is destroyed by an unknown force, Leon suspects a flying bird-like B.R.A.I is to blame for its destruction.

episodes.title: The Wings of Grief and Revenge
episodes.plot: Severely injured from her battle against fellow disciple Wang, Queenie Yoh must take to the sky to face the winged B.R.A.I that he controls.

episodes.title: The Phantom Bear
episodes.plot: Leon gets dressed up to head to the city, and Chloe follows him. She thinks he has a crush, but he's tracking a strange phenomenon.

episodes.title: The Blind Spot in the Rain
episodes.plot: When several people inside the city die from high-powered projectiles, Leon and the Pandora team must find the killer before more casualties occur.

episodes.title: Eye of the Tiger
episodes.plot: The Pandora team scrambles to find the culprit when one of their own is wounded. Cain tells the story of a notorious sniper that let him live.

episodes.title: Red Flame Recollection
episodes.plot: A defiant Mr. Gold vows to overthrow Cecile and take over the city. Desperate to help, Gren begs Leon to install another hyperdrive system in his MOEV.

episodes.title: Dr. Lon Wu
episodes.plot: After testing the dark drive that seems to accelerate the B.R.A.I's evolution, Leon recalls his research leader who perished in the reactor accident.

episodes.title: Red God of Death
episodes.plot: When a deadly contagion spreads outside the city, the team must choose between protecting the city or taking in the wave of incoming refugees.

episodes.title: The Cries of Chaos
episodes.plot: With the reactor dangerously unstable from multiple B.R.A.I attacks, Leon surmises that a possible leak originating from its core could be to blame.

episodes.title: The Tower of Grudges
episodes.plot: With operational functionality failing, the team must stop a centipede-like B.R.A.I. that's been destroying key facilities outside the city walls.

episodes.title: The Fierce God of Gold
episodes.plot: As the side effects from using the hyperdrive system takes its toll, Leon brings the team to his old shack so they can repair their damaged MOEVs.

episodes.title: The Innovator
episodes.plot: The battle for control of the city comes to a dramatic end. The mysterious Sieg, an advisor and ally to Mr. Gold, appears before a fatigued Leon.

episodes.title: A Servant's Pride
episodes.plot: With Cecile absent while recovering from her injuries, Jay places Queenie as her body double, training her to look and act just like the mayor.

episodes.title: Dueling Blades
episodes.plot: After experiencing a severe food shortage due to the recent B.R.A.I attacks, the Pandora team must accompany a supply convoy safely back to the city.

episodes.title: The Awakening Begins
episodes.plot: While Leon recovers from his injuries sustained from Sieg, members of Pandora utilizing the hyperdrive system begin to encounter a strange phenomenon.

episodes.title: The Target in the Sky
episodes.plot: After a mysterious energy blast obliterates a nearby city, the team must figure out a way to stop their own city from being destroyed in the same way.

episodes.title: Reverberating Souls
episodes.plot: After a mysterious B.R.A.I. reaches out to him, Doug asks Leon if their personalities will stay the same even after they become one with their MOEVs.

episodes.title: The Closed Mountain
episodes.plot: Leon and Queenie set out in search of the missing Fiona, whose powers are critical in suppressing the reactor core.

episodes.title: The Circle of Life
episodes.plot: A swarm of bee-like B.R.A.I advances towards the city walls, but Leon believes their intentions are non-hostile and he asks Gren's unit to stand down.

episodes.title: At the End of Evolution
episodes.plot: With Leon's mind trapped wandering through multiple dimensions, Fiona considers entering into his consciousness to bring him back and save him.

episodes.title: Gleaming Darkness
episodes.plot: With Sieg's diabolical plan starting to take physical form, Cecile and the Pandora team prepare for their final mission to save the world.

episodes.title: The Chosen Future
episodes.plot: Leon and the Pandora team brace for their final battle as Sieg's ultimate manifestation makes its way inside the city's perimeter.
